entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 10:28 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 late in the morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:28 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
